Question: Shenzhen Top-Link Technologies Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Top-Link Technologies Co., Ltd.

Product Highlight:
- TP-Link debuts its latest line of Wi-Fi 7 innovations at CES 2024, featuring a comprehensive collection of Deco Mesh Wi-Fi systems, next-gen Archer routers, and a powerful gaming router, along with the world's first Wi-Fi 7 client adapter.
- Deco Mesh Wi-Fi systems offer robust and reliable network with faster speeds, lower latency, and more capacity, featuring cutting-edge Wi-Fi 7 technologies.
- Archer routers redefine home networking with innovative technology, including quad-band Wi-Fi 7 router, gaming router, and Wi-Fi 7 network adapters.

Specifications:
- Deco flagship Wi-Fi 7 Mesh system, Deco BE95, offers combined speeds of up to 33 Gbps across 16 streams and 4 bands, equipped with lightning-fast multi-gigabit ports.
- Archer BE900, a revolutionary quad-stream router, redefines Wi-Fi performance with quad-band 24.4 Gbps speed, 12Ã— optimally positioned internal antennas, and 10G WAN/LAN ports.
- Archer GE800, a gaming router, offers tri-band combined speeds of 19 Gbps, and two 10G ports, designed to elevate gaming performance.

These products aim to deliver unparalleled connectivity experience for homes and businesses, showcasing TP-Link's commitment to innovation and performance.
